plot: As Chris' relationship with his brother is tested, Kate becomes increasingly suspicious of James and William. Meanwhile, Kirstie tries to convince the Risen to take Sam's offer as Phil discovers the truth about James.

As Kirstie reconsiders the offer to go to Sweden, a dust storm forces the group to take refuge at the lake house. As they continue to debate if they can trust Phil, Phil learns of James's recent change; but will he be the only one to make the discovery?Lets see.

James takes Phil home to get him out of the way. Chris shows Belle her police statement of her death and how her mother lied in the report about how she died. Pete Rennox falls down the stairs in his wheelchair. Chris checks and Pete has no pulse, but miraculously opens his eyes and walks away. Kirstie meets Sam in secret. Pete reveals to Chris that he killed Kirstie and that he'll have to do it again. Phil figures out that James is just like him.
